entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow and Blowing Snow, -13.2°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Blanc-Sablon Airport 11:27 PM AST Friday 03 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow and Blowing Snow
Temperature: -13.2°C
Pressure / Tendency: 97.5 kPa rising
Visibility: 4.8 km
Humidity: 75 %
Wind Chill: -25
Dewpoint: -16.7°C
Wind: W 41 km/h gust 67 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: N/A

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 19. POP 40%
entry.summary: Snow ending late this evening then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries. Blowing snow over exposed areas early this evening. Amount 5 to 10 cm. Wind southeast 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming light this evening. Wind becoming southwest 60 gusting to 80 near midnight. Low minus 19. Wind chill minus 5 this evening and minus 34 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10.
entry.summary: Periods of light snow. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 50 km/h gusting to 80. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 34 in the morning and minus 21 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Clearing. Low minus 20.
entry.summary: Clearing in the evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas. Wind southwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming northwest 70 gusting to 90 in the evening then diminishing to 40 gusting to 60 overnight. Low minus 20. Wind chill minus 21 in the evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:30 PM NST Friday 03 February 2023
